import React, {useContext} from 'react' import {ProductsContext} from "../Contexts/ProductContext" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import CategoryStyle from './css/category.module.css' import Logo from "./Logo" import ProductCard from "./ProductCard.js" import SearchBar from "./SearchBar" import Nav from "./Nav" import CartButton from "./CartButton" function Menswear() { const product = useContext(ProductsContext) function filterProduct() { const selectedProduct = product.products.filter((item) => item.category === "men's clothing"); return selectedProduct } return (
{filterProduct().map(prod => (
))}
) } export default Menswear
